I

I2CService - Class in com.bluecreation.melodysmart
Interface with the I2C service in MelodySmart
I2CService() - Constructor for class com.bluecreation.melodysmart.I2CService
 
I2CService.Listener - Interface in com.bluecreation.melodysmart
Class used to report the application or module accessing a MelodySmart device about changes in the I2C service.
ImageManager - Class in com.bluecreation.melodysmart
ImageManager provides the functionality to list and download the official MelodySmart OTAU images as well as to prepare a raw image with the correct bluetooth address and XtalTrim parameters before it is downloaded to a remote device
ImageManager() - Constructor for class com.bluecreation.melodysmart.ImageManager
 
ImageManagerListener - Interface in com.bluecreation.melodysmart
Interface used to report the application or the component using the MelodySmart library about events related with querying and downloading new MelodySmart OTAU images
init(Context) - Method in class com.bluecreation.melodysmart.MelodySmartDevice
Initializes the MelodySmart library.
isAvailable() - Method in class com.bluecreation.melodysmart.LEService
Queries whether the service is currently available on a remote MelodySmart device.
isBonded() - Method in class com.bluecreation.melodysmart.MelodySmartDevice
Checks whether the Android phone is bonded with the Melody Smart device.
isOtauAvailable() - Method in class com.bluecreation.melodysmart.MelodySmartDevice
Queries whether the connected remote MelodySmart device supports OTAU and it is already available, which can happen some seconds after connecting to the device.
isRunning(String) - Method in class com.bluecreation.melodysmart.NotificationsIssueWorkaround
